code: import*as types from'./../constants/ActionType';export var actAddToCart=function actAddToCart(product,quantity){return{type:types.ADD_TO_CART,product:product,quantity:quantity};};export var actChangeMessage=function actChangeMessage(message){return{type:types.CHANGE_MESSAGE,message:message};};export var actDeleteProductInCart=function actDeleteProductInCart(product){return{type:types.DELETE_PRODUCT_IN_CART,product:product};};export var actUpdateProductInCart=function actUpdateProductInCart(product,quantity){return{type:types.UPDATE_PRODUCT_IN_CART,product:product,quantity:quantity};};
